Because one truly upholds the correct Dharma oneself, understands it all, and widely expounds it for others, and also properly serves others well, one thus attains the mark of slender and round calves like the king of deer.

Extensively offering the most wonderful delicacies and food to sentient beings, causing them all to be satisfied, thereby one attains the mark of the seven parts of the body being full and even.

In accordance with the arising of various proper activities in sentient beings, one is able to be the leader and assist them, free from arrogance and a harsh mind, able to carry out beneficial matters for sentient beings, thereby one attains the upper half of the body like a lion king.
In all matters, one's nature is courageous and decisive, and one also attains the marks of a round shoulder and neck, full armpits, an upright appearance, and a tall and broad body.
